name: Traffic Racing Miami Street 3D
description:
Welcome to Miami City! Take part in a real street racing – drive fast!

Welcome to hot Miami – may be the best city in the world! Beaches with white sand, lovely warm sea…and also amazing skyscrapers, busy streets and high traffic. We invite you to take part in incredible challenge – drive real sport car and show the best result! Traffic Racing Miami Street 3D – ready, set, go!

Drive through long streets of Miami, using gas pedal and brakes, avoid obstacles and overspeeding. Enjoy your trip and prove you are the best high speed racer in the world!

Traffic Racing Miami Street 3D GAME FEATURES:
- Realistic car driving simulator;
- Beautiful streets of Miami;
- Different sport cars models;
- Special bonuses;
- Easy-to-use controls;
- Cool sounds and graphics.

Let’s start our amazing race – Miami racing championship welcomes you! Traffic Racing Miami Street 3D – it’s your chance to become world famous racer!
